location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Willock, Second Assistant to H M Mission, at Bushire, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Henry Willock, Second Assistant to H M Mission, at Bushire, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter of the same date and confirming that it will be forwarded on the following day by two horsemen, jelowdars, and requesting to send further communications as early as possible, so that they could be dispatched at the same time.
